events.name: BatchTrackingInitiated
events.description: This event signifies the beginning of a batch tracking process.

events.name: BatchStatusUpdated
events.description: Represents an update on the status of a batch being tracked.

events.name: BatchDelivered
events.description: Indicates that a batch has been successfully delivered.

events.name: BatchTrackingEnded
events.description: Signifies the completion of the batch tracking process.

commands.name: Initiate
commands.description: This event signifies the beginning of a batch tracking process.

commands.name: UpdateStatus
commands.description: Represents an update on the status of a batch being tracked.

commands.name: Deliver
commands.description: Indicates that a batch has been successfully delivered.

commands.name: EndTracking
commands.description: Signifies the completion of the batch tracking process.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with inventory management to track stock levels related to batches.

integrationPoints.name: SupplyChainManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with supply chain systems for enhanced visibility of batch movement.

integrationPoints.name: QualityControl
integrationPoints.description: Linking to quality control systems to validate batches during tracking.

integrationPoints.name: LogisticsManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with logistics management for real-time tracking of batch deliveries.
